overview:
Serial entrepreneur in Telco’s and Internet since ‘95

Now fully focused on MyID.is Certified, the 1st global digital ID certification plateform in the world. Enabling since 2007 pure online validation that â€œyou are who you say you areâ€.

Our solution allows our users to find online all use values associated with their government issued identity.

Such as proving their identity online, developing web of trust and related services, secure e-commerce deliveries, electronically sign a document with probative value such as an insurance contract, opening a bank account, etc. … The list of possibilities associated with the dematerialization of the civil identity is too wide to be detailed here.

We are building the future of the web of trust and giving the community the tools to build high-end value new web services.
